titleStmt.title: Loves empire, or, The amours of the French court
titleStmt.author: Bussy, Roger de Rabutin, comte de, 1618-1693.
R. H.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Dorman Newman at the Kings Arms in the Poultry.,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Roger de Rabutin, comte de Bussy by Wing (2nd ed.).
Item at reel 282:17 identified as Wing L3264A (number cancelled); Wing (2nd ed., rev.) identifies this item as B6259A.
Reproductions of originals in Huntington Library and Harvard University Library.
